actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study with respect to the feasibility of establishing the William Bartram Trail throughout Georgia as a national scenic trail.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study with respect to the feasibility of establishing the William Bartram Trail which extends through Georgia as a national scenic trail.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study with respect to the feasibility of establishing the William Bartram Trail throughout Georgia as a national scenic trail.
